Articles.Content: I built a large frigate class fueling station using the Engineer, Kethane, Kerbal Attachment System, and KW Rocketry mods. I need help cutting down on parts. How do I upload the .craft file?

You'll need to send it to a file-sharing site such as Mediafire.com. Most places give you free accounts or don't require accounts at all. But often, posting a picture is enough for people to lend help. For pics, you'll also need to post links to sharing sites like Imgur.com.

Incidentally, the ship Exchange is for players to share completed ships. I've moved your thread to gameplay questions, where the folks who like to help other players hang around, looking for questions to answer.

Edited February 15, 2014 by Vanamonde
